title: Any thoughts on this French New Wave font?
content:
This cinematic font is just so damn attractive and would be extremely useful for a project I'm working on. Any thoughts on what it might be? Also interested in other French New Wave style fonts as well. Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623021302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/894283ce3f5a8494d19b92aa7422550caf360430_m_4093.jpg)
author: Gazpachot
